qas.question: How many non-jewish African immigrants live in Israel?
Where are most of them from?
Where are the non jewish immigrants from?

context: Additionally, there are <a0_0>around 60,000<a0_0/> non-Jewish African immigrants in Israel, some of whom have sought <a1_0>asylum<a1_0/>. Most of the migrants are from communities in <a2_0>Sudan and Eritrea<a2_0/>, particularly the <a3_0>Niger-Congo<a3_0/>-speaking Nuba groups of the <a4_0>southern Nuba Mountains<a4_0/>; some are illegal immigrants.
